Equipment and other supplies 
1. The maternity unit has, from time to time, a lack of equipment, including:
a. CTG machines in numbers sufficient to provide continuous monitoring to all high risk patients.
b. Multi -parameter monitors
c. Incubators
d. Blood gas machines
2. In addition, the procurement of consumables can be a challenge, including continuous supplies of CTG paper,
Maternity Case Record books, Road to Health Cards.
3. On occasion
